title: Register your farm waste exemptions online

details.description: Register agricultural and other farm waste you don't need an environmental permit for to store, recycle or dispose of with the Environment Agency
details.more_information:
There is no charge to register, but you must meet certain conditions.

Get detailed information on the [Environment Agency](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk/business/sectors/115869.aspx "Registering your exemptions (Environment Agency)"){:rel="external"} website.
 
To register, you'll need:

+ your name and address
+ the registered address and number of your limited company, if you have one
+ the address where the exempt activity is being carried out
+ the reference numbers for the exemptions you're registering - you can find exemption numbers on the [Environment Agency website](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk/business/sectors/116498.aspx "Find waste exemption reference numbers on the Environment Agency website"){:rel="external"}
 
If you can't provide a postcode for the place where the exempt activity is taking place you will need a [12-digit grid reference.](http://www.ukgr.dreamhosters.com/ "UK Grid Reference Finder"){:rel="external"}
details.introduction: Usually, you need a permit to treat, recover or get rid of farm waste. However, some low-risk activities are exempt. You need to register these - the easiest way to register is with the Environment Agency's online exemptions service.
